articles.title: Milky Way: Manchester astronomers find mysterious object - BBC.com
articles.description: A research project, led by the University of Manchester, finds the "new object" 40,000 light years away.
articles.content:
By Nina MasseyPA Science Correspondent
The discovery of the object was made using the MeerKAT radio telescope array in South Africa
A new object in the Milky Way that is heavier than the heaviest n… [+3338 chars]

articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: 2nd image of 1st black hole ever pictured confirms Einstein's general relativity (photo) - Space.com
articles.description: The second image of the supermassive black hole in M87 was taken by the Event Horizon Telescope shows it still has a shadow just as Einstein predicted.

articles.author: Simon Speakman Cordall
articles.title: ‘Credibility at stake’: Why did Iran strike inside Pakistan amid Gaza war? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Tehran’s attacks on Pakistani, Iraqi and Syrian land have only one thing in common, say analysts: a show of strength.
articles.content: In just two days this week, Iran launched missiles first into Iraqs semi-autonomous Kurdish region and Syria, and then into Pakistan in attacks that could further inflame tensions in a region on edge… [+5664 chars]
